name: Natural Born Soldier
description:
Natural Born Soldier: Non-boring story line, not a P2W, not explosive driven, but a well-balanced action-packed cross-platform multiplayer FPS which come in a small package that doesn’t consume too much battery! Yeahhhh.

Step into the battlefield and join this competitive combat in the most skill-based mobile FPS!

FEATURES
● Intense multiplayer including various game modes, multiple weapons and well-crafted environments.
● 1-8 players (co-op or competitive).
● Push the character personalization to next level by customizing your 3D soldier's face using any picture from your preferred character or even using your own selfie!
● More than 400 customization combinations available to design your unique soldier!
● Exclusive game modes like Capture The Wolf, Adrenaline and Search & Protect.
● Cool and unique match voting system.
● Smooth, intuitive and customizable controls.
● Add your friends, see when they are online and join their current match.
● Leaderboard for the whole world.

The game is still under development, so more maps, weapons, and features to come, and any bugs found will be hunted down, but the game is already in a pretty good shape to have a great time.

SUPPORT
Soldier, have you been injured and require some support? Not a problem, please contact me in game by going to the «About» screen and tapping «Feedback» button or by sending me an email at supports@naturalbornsoldier.com

FOLLOW ME
